sentences.sContent: Four paintings stolen from the gallery have been recovered.
sentences.sCn: 美术馆的四幅被盗画作已经失而复得。

sentences.sContent: ...There 're many people who recover from cancer...
...Many people are borrowing on credit cards so heavily that payoff rates at these levels are not sufficient to recover their credit card debt by the end of their life...

remMethod.val: re(重新) ＋ cover(包括) → 重新获得

words.tran: 可收回的；可恢复的；可补偿的
回收器；财产收回取得者；追索财产者

trans.tranOther: to get back something that was taken from you, lost, or almost destroyed
